entities.name: ginn
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as suddenly speaking up to identify a group of people. She says 'I think that's them, Al'.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is mentioned as being relieved and having his trunk and owl lifted onto the train by Harry and Ron.

entities.name: rose
entities.description: Rose is mentioned as already wearing her brand-new Hogwarts robes and beaming at Albus.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as asking Harry if he parked the car all right and whispering to him that he actually Confunded the examiner.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being with Ron and lifting Albus's trunk and owl onto the train.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as not believing Ron could pass a Muggle driving test and having faith in him.

entities.name: hugo
entities.description: Hugo is mentioned as Rose's younger brother and having an animated discussion with Lily about which House they should be sorted into.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as being with Hugo and discussing which House they should be sorted into.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are mentioned as working together to lift Albus's trunk and owl onto the train.
Hermione is mentioned as having faith in Ron's ability to pass a Muggle driving test.
Hugo and Lily are mentioned as discussing which House they should be sorted into.
